posts.post_content: I would like to see if anyone is interested in trading with me as I have decided to venture into completing the T3 Turkey Red set which will take a few years because of the cost. I have about 20 so far and am looking for any you may want to part with that are in poor to good condition. Please email me if interested at ALL CARDS TRADED[URL="andrewhahn55@gmail.com"]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/URL]

Hey, Andrew--

PM sent.
Please reply by [url]emai--djdoremus@msn.com[/url]--as my pm box is full.

Thanks.

Doug

Doug,

I am interested in the Starr and Seymour, but I have no T3 to trade.  You can email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url]  Thanks, Bill
